Translations.Text: A d yini umsaaef is: "a Mass nne$! Ur t rri$ d amjuo, d neppa i illan di ttelfan u$miq
Inna: "ur ppemnamaret ara $uoI, imi wen d Zzewre$ aaggen
Ur ipbeddil $uoI wawal. Nek, ur Iiuoou$ imdanen
Ass ideg ara Nini i Loahennama: "ma teccuoev"? A d tini: "ma tella tmerna
Tqeob ed Loennet, ar wid ipeezziben, ur tebaad
D tagi i wen ippuwaaaden; i yal atubi ieerzen
ippagwaden Aenin di tbavnit, iteddun s wul ucaif
Ekcemt ep, di tifrat, d wagi ay d ass uwekkeo
Nnsen, dinna, ayen i sen ihwan; s$uone£, timerna
Aceal isuta ay Nesqucc uqbel nnsen! Llan $elben ten di loehd. Qelben, di tmurt, anda t ssoan
Deg waya, s tidep, asmekti i win isaan ul, ne$ ifkan tameeeu$t, u d anagi
Ni$ Nxelq ed tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, di sdis wussan, ur Naayi
Eubeo i wayen d qqaoen, sbuccaa s ccekoan Mass ik, uqbel ad inqeo yiiij, uqbel ad i$li
Deg iv sbuccaa iT, akked deffir lekni
Ssemees, ass ideg ara d iberree uberrae, si tama iqeoben
Ass ideg ara slen i usu$u, s tidep, ass nni, d ass n tuff$a
Ih, Nekwni Nessidir u Nneqq. £uone£ tu$alin
Ass ideg ara tceqqeq tmurt $uosen s tazla. Afesser agi d ayen isehlen fellane£
Nekwni Nif akw akken Neeoa acu id qqaoen. Ur telliv fellasen d aqehhao. Mmekti d, s Leqwoan, wid ippagwaden aaggen iW
S wavu iwezzaen
I ibubben taakkwemt
Wid ippazalen s shala
Tid ifeoqen lameo
Ar ayen i wen ippuaahden, d tidep
Aqeiii, ih, ad iuao
S igenni bu idurra
Kunwi temgarradem $ef wawal
Iooa t win iooan
Tameppant i ikeddaben
Nitni, di maylellif, stehzan
steqsayen: "anda t wass uqeiii
Ass ideg, ara ppuhewlen di tmes
Jeoobet ahewwel nnwen agi i$ef tearem
Ih, wid ipeezziben, di leonanat akked tliwa
Iifen ayen i sen Ifka Mass nnsen. Ih, nitni llan, iu$ leal, d lauuam
Deg iv, cwii ay gganen
Di tafrara, nitni ste$fioen
deg wayla nnsen: amur i umappar akked ume$bun
U di tmurt, issekniyen i wid ipputebbten
Llant deg iman nnwen. Aani ur tepwalim ara
U deg igenni, ooeeq nnwen, akked wayen i wen ippuwaaaden
S Mass n tmurt akked igenwan, ar neppa d tidep, am akken kunwi tepmeslayem
Ma tebbwev ik id tedyant inebgawen ukyisen n Iboahim
Kecmen $uoes, nnan as: "tifrat"! Inna: "tifrat a wid ur nessin
Inser ar twacult is, ibbwi d aajmi iqebbwan
Iqeob asen t id; inna: "day ur teppeppem ara
Ieus iugad iten. Nnan as: "ur ppagwad"! D$a beccoen t s uqcic amusnaw
Tqeob ed tmeiiut is, tsu$, tewwet deg udem is, tenna d: "tam$aot tiaiqeot
Nnan: "akka id Inna Mass im. Ih, Neppa, d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
